tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V2.1.7 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: Riot
programme.desc: Premiere. In 1978, when the push to decriminalise homosexuality in Australia has stalled, a group of activists led by former union boss Lance Gowland decide they must make one final attempt to celebrate who they are. Drama, starring Damon Herriman, Kate Box and Xavier Samuel.(n)

programme.title: Stella's Last Weekend
programme.desc: Premiere. The relationship between two brothers is challenged when they find they are in love with the same girl. Comedy drama, starring Nat and Alex Wolff, and Paulina Singer.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Premiere. Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez.(n)

programme.title: Serenity: Special
programme.desc: A look at the new thriller Serenity, with Matthew McConaughey as a fisherman whose tranquil life is shattered by the arrival of ex-wife Anne Hathaway.(n)

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: A security expert on assignment in Hong Kong must infiltrate a burning skyscraper, 225 storeys above ground level, when his family is trapped inside by criminals out to frame him. Action thriller, starring Dwayne Johnson, Neve Campbell and Chin Han.(n)

programme.title: Tag
programme.desc: Premiere. A group of former classmates organise an elaborate, annual game of tag, aka tick, that requires some to travel all over the United States. Comedy, starring Jeremy Renner, Ed Helms and Jake Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Stella's Last Weekend
programme.desc: Premiere. The relationship between two brothers is challenged when they find they are in love with the same girl. Comedy drama, starring Nat and Alex Wolff, and Paulina Singer.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Premiere. Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez.(n)

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: A security expert on assignment in Hong Kong must infiltrate a burning skyscraper, 225 storeys above ground level, when his family is trapped inside by criminals out to frame him. Action thriller, starring Dwayne Johnson, Neve Campbell and Chin Han.(n)

programme.title: Tag
programme.desc: Premiere. A group of former classmates organise an elaborate, annual game of tag, aka tick, that requires some to travel all over the United States. Comedy, starring Jeremy Renner, Ed Helms and Jake Johnson.(n)

programme.title: First Reformed
programme.desc: Premiere. The minister of a small congregation in upstate New York grapples with a sense of mounting despair brought on by tragedy, worldly concerns and a tormented past. Drama, starring Ethan Hawke, Amanda Seyfried and Cedric Antonio Kyles - better known as Cedric the Entertainer.(n)

programme.title: Taps
programme.desc: When a military academy is threatened with demolition, the fiercely loyal cadets break out the contents of the armoury and fight to defend the institution from the invading developers - ultimately leading to a confrontation with the real army. Drama, starring George C Scott, Timothy Hutton, Sean Penn and Tom Cruise.(n)

programme.title: Modern Life Is Rubbish
programme.desc: A decade after getting together, music lovers Liam and Natalie decide to split, but their record collection keeps pulling them back together. Romantic comedy, starring Josh Whitehouse, Freya Mavor and Ian Hart.(n)

programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: British broadcaster and journalist David Frost comes up with the idea of setting up a series of exclusive televised interviews with the disgraced former president of the United States, Richard Nixon. Believing he could use the publicity as a chance to resurrect his political career and make some easy money, Nixon agrees but soon realises he has underestimated Frost. Fact-based drama, starring Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Sam Rockwell and Kevin Bacon.(n)

programme.title: Atonement
programme.desc: In 1935, 13-year-old Briony Tallis discovers the burgeoning relationship between her older sister Cecilia and Robbie Turner, a servant's son whom she has a crush on herself. The teenager becomes increasingly jealous of the pair and spitefully accuses him of a crime he did not commit, unaware her actions will have tragic repercussions. Joe Wright's romantic period drama, based on Ian McEwan's novel, starring Keira Knightley, James McAvoy, Brenda Blethyn, Saoirse Ronan and Romola Garai.(n)

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: Single man Frank Adler attempts to raise his child prodigy niece, Mary. However, his plans for a normal school life for the youngster are foiled when the youngster's mathematical abilities come to the attention of Frank's formidable mother, Evelyn. Drama, starring Chris Evans, Lindsay Duncan and Mckenna Grace.(n)

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: Baker Dill lives a peaceful life as a fishing boat captain, leading tours off a tranquil cove. His peace is shattered when estranged ex-wife Karen reappears, begging for him to help save her and their son from her violent husband. Thriller, written and directed by Peaky Blinders creator Steven Knight, starring Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway and Diane Lane.(n)

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A woman sets out to make life a living hell for her ex-husband's new fiancee. Thriller, starring Rosario Dawson, Katherine Heigl and Geoff Stults.(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: The spirit of a murdered executive tries to find a way to help his girlfriend bring his killer to justice and enlists the aid of a fraudulent medium - who is amazed and baffled when her psychic powers turn out to be all too real. Romantic fantasy, starring Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore, Tony Goldwyn and an Oscar-winning Whoopi Goldberg.(n)

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: Baker Dill lives a peaceful life as a fishing boat captain, leading tours off a tranquil cove. His peace is shattered when estranged ex-wife Karen reappears, begging for him to help save her and their son from her violent husband. Thriller, written and directed by Peaky Blinders creator Steven Knight, starring Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway and Diane Lane.(n)

programme.title: Battle of the Sexes
programme.desc: Women's tennis champion Billie Jean King takes up the challenge of former men's champ Bobby Riggs to a winner-takes-all match. Comedy drama, starring Emma Stone, Steve Carell and Andrea Riseborough.(n)

programme.title: That Thing You Do
programme.desc: A small-town beat combo become a national overnight sensation with their debut record - but their sudden success looks to be a one-off, leaving them struggling to find a way of repeating the formula. Comedy drama set in the 1960s, written and directed by Tom Hanks, who also appears as the band's manager. With Tom Everett Scott, Liv Tyler and Johnathon Schaech.(n)

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Two black male FBI agents pose as white female debutantes in the line of duty, donning full drag and very heavy make-up in an audacious bid to infiltrate a kidnapping ring. Comedy, starring brothers Shawn and Marlon Wayans, with Jaime King and Frankie Faison.(n)

programme.title: Shallow Hal
programme.desc: Superficial Hal is only interested in dating physically perfect women, but his outlook is changed when a self-help guru hypnotises him into seeing inner beauty - and he ends up falling for a spirited overweight woman. However, when the hypnosis wears off he struggles to remember that looks are not everything. Farrelly Brothers comedy, starring Gwyneth Paltrow, Jack Black, Jason Alexander and Joe Viterelli.(n)

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: The bumbling fool wins first prize in the church raffle - a trip to France and a video camera. His travels cause chaos as he disrupts a film shoot in Cannes, to the fury of its megalomaniac director, and is then accused of kidnapping a youngster. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Willem Dafoe, Emma de Caunes and Max Baldry.(n)

programme.title: Blockers
programme.desc: Julie, Kayla and Sam are high school seniors who make a pact to lose their virginity on prom night. Lisa, Mitchell and Hunter are the overprotective parents who try to stop the girls from sealing the deal, no matter what the cost. Comedy, starring Leslie Mann, John Cena and Ike Barinholtz.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow.(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: A food critic realises she is in love with her best friend just as he announces he is going to marry another woman. Determined to have him to herself, she heads for the wedding with the intention of sabotaging the ceremony - but persuading the groom to give up on his bride-to-be proves harder than expected. Romantic comedy, starring Julia Roberts, Dermot Mulroney, Cameron Diaz and Rupert Everett.(n)

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: The bumbling fool wins first prize in the church raffle - a trip to France and a video camera. His travels cause chaos as he disrupts a film shoot in Cannes, to the fury of its megalomaniac director, and is then accused of kidnapping a youngster. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Willem Dafoe, Emma de Caunes and Max Baldry.(n)

programme.title: Blockers
programme.desc: Julie, Kayla and Sam are high school seniors who make a pact to lose their virginity on prom night. Lisa, Mitchell and Hunter are the overprotective parents who try to stop the girls from sealing the deal, no matter what the cost. Comedy, starring Leslie Mann, John Cena and Ike Barinholtz.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow.(n)

programme.title: American Pie: Reunion
programme.desc: Jim Levenstein and his old friends return to their home town for a high-school reunion. Struck by how much their lives have changed, they set out to relive the sexual misadventures of their adolescence, but only end up making bigger fools of themselves than they did as teenagers. Comedy sequel to the American Pie movies, starring Jason Biggs and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: GI Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: When a powerful experimental weapon is snatched by a mysterious terrorist organisation, two of the soldiers guarding it are recruited into a top-secret military strike force. As they go in search of the stolen technology, they uncover a plot by its creator to take over the world. Action adventure, with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston.(n)

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: A scientist researching Alzheimer's disease devises a way to enlarge the brains of killer sharks on an isolated research facility to help develop her theories. However, the experiments result in a marked increase in the creatures' intelligence, and before long they manage to escape their confinement - with bloody consequences. Thriller, starring Saffron Burrows, Thomas Jane, Stellan Skarsgard, LL Cool J and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a future dominated by the deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin.(n)

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.(n)

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: The wisecracking anti-hero meets Russell, a gifted youngster pursued by a heavily armed cyborg from the future. With the aid of fellow mutant Domino and five less lucky teammates, they attempt to defeat the villainous Cable. Action comedy, starring Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Julian Dennison and Zazie Beetz.(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A New England seaside town's tourist season is turned into a nightmare by a giant killer shark. The local police chief's efforts to protect the public are thwarted by the greedy mayor, forcing him to join forces with a grizzled fisherman and an enthusiastic marine biologist to hunt and kill the monster predator. Steven Spielberg's thriller, starring Roy Scheider, Richard Dreyfuss and Robert Shaw.(n)

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: T'Challa, the new ruler of a hidden African nation, faces a challenge for his throne in the form of his cousin, Erik 'Killmonger' Stevens. Assisted by his tribe's forces and CIA agent Everett K Ross, T'Challa is soon locked in a life-or-death struggle for the future of the world. Marvel's comic-book adventure, starring Chadwick Boseman, Michael B Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o and Martin Freeman.(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: When galactic warlord Thanos attempts to obtain powerful stones to execute an insane plan, the Avengers and their allies join forces to stop him. Fantasy adventure, starring Robert Downey Jr, Chris Hemsworth, Josh Brolin and Benedict Cumberbatch.(n)

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: The wisecracking anti-hero meets Russell, a gifted youngster pursued by a heavily armed cyborg from the future. With the aid of fellow mutant Domino and five less lucky teammates, they attempt to defeat the villainous Cable. Action comedy, starring Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Julian Dennison and Zazie Beetz.(n)

programme.title: Ace in the Hole
programme.desc: An abrasive, hard-drinking reporter is reduced to working for a small-town newspaper, where he discovers a man trapped in a mine shaft. He sees a chance to revive his career, and manipulates the rescue operation to drag things out as long as possible, creating a media circus but putting the man's life in jeopardy. Billy Wilder's drama, starring Kirk Douglas and Jan Sterling.(n)

programme.title: Demon
programme.desc: A bridegroom is possessed by a spirit in the midst of his own wedding celebration. Comedy horror, starring Itay Tiran, Agnieszka Zulewska and Andrzej Grabowski. In Polish.(n)

programme.title: This Is Spinal Tap
programme.desc: An ageing British rock band try to revive their fortunes by embarking on a US tour, with a film-maker on hand to record the mayhem. However, the big comeback soon turns into a series of disasters as tensions between the clueless rockers and their long-suffering manager reach breaking point. Spoof documentary, starring Michael McKean, Christopher Guest, Harry Shearer and Rob Reiner.(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A scientist is fired from his job with a tobacco company, and agrees to expose his former employers' secrets to a journalist - including the allegation that the company had deliberately increased the addictive quality of cigarettes. Michael Mann's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, Russell Crowe, Christopher Plummer, Diane Venora and Philip Baker Hall.(n)

programme.title: The High Frontier
programme.desc: A father and his two teenage sons travel to a mountain cabin for an adventure. However, when a mysterious stranger arrives at the residence, their outing turns into a struggle for survival. Thriller, starring Bartosz Bielenia, Janusz Chabior and Andrzej Chyra.(n)

programme.title: Our Man Flint
programme.desc: The world is rocked by a series of mysterious ecological disasters, while top secret agents from all nations are being murdered. Super-cool American spy Derek Flint is soon on the case, and discovers a fiendish organisation using a weather-controlling machine to hold the world to ransom. Comedy adventure, with James Coburn, Lee J Cobb and Gina Golan.(n)

programme.title: Who We Are Now
programme.desc: An ex-con tries to win back custody of her son with the help of an idealistic young public defender, and at the same time falls into a romantic fling with a traumatised former US soldier. Drama, starring Julianne Nicholson, Zachary Quinto, Jess Weixler and Jason Biggs.(n)

programme.title: The Town
programme.desc: A thief takes a bank manager hostage while he and his gang make their getaway, only to later learn she lives in the same neighbourhood as him. As FBI agents close in, he tries to befriend her to make sure she cannot identify him, but as he falls in love with her, he considers changing his ways - risking the fury of his unstable partner in crime. Drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck. With Rebecca Hall and Jeremy Renner.(n)

programme.title: Downsizing
programme.desc: In a future plagued with overpopulation, a man realises he would have a better life if he were to shrink himself to five inches tall. Alexander Payne's sci-fi comedy, starring Matt Damon and Christoph Waltz.(n)

programme.title: Thoroughbreds
programme.desc: Two upper-class Connecticut teenagers rekindle their unlikely friendship after years of growing apart, and hatch a plan to solve their problems, no matter what the cost. Comedy crime drama, starring Olivia Cooke, Anya Taylor-Joy and Anton Yelchin.(n)

programme.title: The Santa Clause 2
programme.desc: After eight years as Father Christmas, divorced dad Scott Calvin has settled nicely into the role. He is looking forward to another season when he discovers that a clause in his contract means he has to find a wife by Christmas Eve. Disney comedy adventure sequel, with Tim Allen, Elizabeth Mitchell, Judge Reinhold, Spencer Breslin and Eric Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Pirate Fairy
programme.desc: A rebellious fairy steals the magic pixie dust that grants her people the power of flight and runs away, becoming captain of a band of pirates. Tinker Bell and her friends set off to recover the dust, but succumb to a spell that switches their magical powers. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Christina Hendricks and Tom Hiddleston.(n)

programme.title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: Princess Mia of Genovia discovers that although she is supposed to take the throne on her 21st birthday, unmarried women like her are barred from being head of state. She now has just 30 days to find herself a husband - but an ambitious nobleman is determined to sabotage her hopes of romance. Family comedy sequel, with Anne Hathaway, Hector Elizondo, Julie Andrews, John Rhys-Davies and Chris Pine.(n)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure following the fortunes of a plucky young elephant with oversized ears. Mocked by his fellow circus performers, Dumbo finally finds a friend in an enterprising mouse, who helps the poor animal overcome his inhibitions and find fame and fortune as the world's only flying elephant. With the voices of Sterling Holloway and Edward Brophy, and an Oscar-winning score by Frank Churchill and Oliver Wallace.(n)

programme.title: Lion King 3: Hakuna Matata
programme.desc: Firm friends and unlikely heroes Timon and Pumbaa set out to retell the tale of young lion Simba from their perspective - and end up revealing how they met and grew up to become such lovable rogues in the first place. Animated adventure, with the voices of Nathan Lane, Ernie Sabella, Julie Kavner and Matthew Broderick.(n)

programme.title: Lion King II: Simba's Pride
programme.desc: Simba's daughter Kiara befriends a lion cub named Kovu - unaware he is the heir of a banished pride of lions that followed the evil Scar. Sequel to the animated movie, with the voices of Matthew Broderick, Neve Campbell and James Earl Jones.(n)

programme.title: Muppets Most Wanted
programme.desc: The Muppets prepare to head off on a world tour, unaware that Kermit has been replaced by an evil genius who is his exact double. As the dastardly interloper uses the gang's performances as cover for an international crime spree, the real Kermit is left languishing in a Russian prison. Comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Tina Fey and Ty Burrell.(n)

programme.title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: Princess Mia of Genovia discovers that although she is supposed to take the throne on her 21st birthday, unmarried women like her are barred from being head of state. She now has just 30 days to find herself a husband - but an ambitious nobleman is determined to sabotage her hopes of romance. Family comedy sequel, with Anne Hathaway, Hector Elizondo, Julie Andrews, John Rhys-Davies and Chris Pine.(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Ben Gates sets out to clear the family name when evidence emerges that an ancestor was involved in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln. His mission leads him on another globe-trotting treasure hunt that uncovers a secret conspiracy. Adventure sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Helen Mirren, Ed Harris, Harvey Keitel and Jon Voight.(n)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure following the fortunes of a plucky young elephant with oversized ears. Mocked by his fellow circus performers, Dumbo finally finds a friend in an enterprising mouse, who helps the poor animal overcome his inhibitions and find fame and fortune as the world's only flying elephant. With the voices of Sterling Holloway and Edward Brophy, and an Oscar-winning score by Frank Churchill and Oliver Wallace.(n)

programme.title: Muppets Most Wanted
programme.desc: The Muppets prepare to head off on a world tour, unaware that Kermit has been replaced by an evil genius who is his exact double. As the dastardly interloper uses the gang's performances as cover for an international crime spree, the real Kermit is left languishing in a Russian prison. Comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Tina Fey and Ty Burrell.(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Ben Gates sets out to clear the family name when evidence emerges that an ancestor was involved in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln. His mission leads him on another globe-trotting treasure hunt that uncovers a secret conspiracy. Adventure sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Helen Mirren, Ed Harris, Harvey Keitel and Jon Voight.(n)

programme.title: Mars Needs Moms
programme.desc: A nine-year-old boy sees a spacecraft land and kidnap his mother. He stows away on board as the ship travels back to the aliens' Mars homeland. As he tries to rescue her, he learns the Martians have taken her because they need Earth mothers to raise their own children. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Seth Robert Dusky, Dan Fogler and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.(n)

programme.title: Lego Scooby-Doo!: Haunted Hollywood
programme.desc: The Scooby gang try to save an old movie studio, which is not only threatened by developers, but a series of movie monsters too. Animated adventure, with the voices of Frank Welker, Matthew Lillard and Grey Griffin.(n)

programme.title: The Little Vampire
programme.desc: A 13-year-old vampire's clan is threatened by a notorious hunter, but thankfully the youngster has help from a fellow teenager. Animated adventure, with the voice of Rasmus Hardiker, Amy Saville and Jim Carter.(n)

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Creepy couple Morticia and Gomez find their unconventional life threatened by a man claiming to be a long-lost relative. When they welcome him with open arms, they fall prey to a plot that could cost them their ancestral home and the family fortune. Black comedy based on the 1960s TV series, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci, Jimmy Workman and Carel Struycken.(n)

programme.title: Lego Scooby-Doo!: Haunted Hollywood
programme.desc: The Scooby gang try to save an old movie studio, which is not only threatened by developers, but a series of movie monsters too. Animated adventure, with the voices of Frank Welker, Matthew Lillard and Grey Griffin.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Premiere. Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez.(n)

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.(n)

programme.title: Corpse Bride
programme.desc: Shy bridegroom Victor unintentionally gets himself hitched to a ghostly bride, who lures him down into the netherworld. But as he strives to find his way back to the land of the living, a treacherous aristocrat is scheming to marry Victor's flesh-and-blood fiancee. Tim Burton's stop-motion animated fantasy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Emily Watson, Christopher Lee and Richard E Grant.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Premiere. Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez.(n)

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Creepy couple Morticia and Gomez find their unconventional life threatened by a man claiming to be a long-lost relative. When they welcome him with open arms, they fall prey to a plot that could cost them their ancestral home and the family fortune. Black comedy based on the 1960s TV series, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci, Jimmy Workman and Carel Struycken.(n)

programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: Spooky couple Gomez and Morticia hire a nanny to look after their new baby son - and stop him suffering an early death at the hands of his jealous elder siblings. Romance soon blossoms between the new childminder and Uncle Fester, but he does not realise she is planning to kill him once she has got hold of the family fortune. Comedy sequel, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: Flightplan
programme.desc: A widow boards a plane with her daughter and promptly falls asleep. When she wakes up, the girl has disappeared - and the mother's fear turns to outright panic when the aircraft crew insists she boarded the flight alone, suggesting the child is merely a figment of her distressed imagination. Thriller, starring Jodie Foster, Peter Sarsgaard, Sean Bean and Greta Scacchi.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: The leaders of a secret government agency plan to eliminate several agents as part of a cover-up when they face having their dark secrets exposed. One of the targets is able to evade his fate and go on the run - but his escape is threatened by his dependence on drugs to boost his physical and mental capabilities. Spy thriller sequel, with Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz and Edward Norton.(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: A tormented cop searches in vain for the man who killed his wife while also investigating a series of murders connected to an experimental drug that causes nightmarish hallucinations. However, he finds himself pursued by a vengeful woman who thinks he was involved in the death of her sister. Action thriller, based on the video game, starring Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis and Beau Bridges.(n)

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: Successful international smuggler Chris Farraday turns his back on a life of crime to raise a family. However, his brother-in-law crosses a powerful drug lord, who forces Chris to transport billions of dollars of counterfeit money into the US, or his wife and children will be killed. Crime thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Kate Beckinsale, Giovanni Ribisi and Ben Foster.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A fishing boat crew plucks a man out of the sea with two bullet wounds in his back and a safety-deposit number sewn into his skin - but absolutely no memory of who he is or how he got there. In the search for his true identity, he is pursued by assassins - but his skill at evading them suggests his own past is far from straightforward. Thriller, starring Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen and Brian Cox.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: The amnesiac assassin is living quietly in hiding, until his former employers come after him again and murder his girlfriend. A CIA operation has ended in disaster, and those responsible intend to clear their names by implicating Bourne. As the former secret agent tries to evade the hitmen on his trail, he also struggles to piece together the truth about his past. Action thriller sequel, starring Matt Damon, Brian Cox, Joan Allen and Julia Stiles.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Amnesiac rogue assassin Jason Bourne's long-buried memories are reawakened by a British journalist researching the secret organisation that was responsible for transforming him into a killing machine. Meanwhile, a ruthless CIA director becomes convinced Bourne is still a security risk, and plans to dispose of him once and for all. Third instalment of the spy thriller series, directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Matt Damon, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Paddy Considine, Scott Glenn and Albert Finney.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: The leaders of a secret government agency plan to eliminate several agents as part of a cover-up when they face having their dark secrets exposed. One of the targets is able to evade his fate and go on the run - but his escape is threatened by his dependence on drugs to boost his physical and mental capabilities. Spy thriller sequel, with Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz and Edward Norton.(n)

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: A CIA agent is accused of being a sleeper assassin with a deadly purpose - to kill the Russian president during a diplomatic visit and start a third world war. She goes on the run, with her colleagues in hot pursuit - but each attempt to prove her innocence only raises more questions about her identity. Action thriller, starring Angelina Jolie, Liev Schreiber and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: The Black Hole
programme.desc: An intergalactic research team is lulled into a false sense of security by a mad scientist planning to explore a collapsed star - and attacked by his army of deadly androids. Sci-fi adventure, starring Maximilian Schell, Anthony Perkins and Ernest Borgnine, with Roddy McDowall providing the voice of the heroes' robot companion.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
programme.desc: A mysterious, planet-sized energy cloud is heading for Earth, destroying everything in its path. Admiral James T Kirk returns to the bridge of the Enterprise to stop the invader, but he has to contend with a bitter rival and the possession of one of his crew by the alien force. Sci-fi adventure, the first movie based on the TV series, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley and Persis Khambatta.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew faces a bitter battle to the death with an old enemy. Khan, a genetically engineered superhuman tyrant, has escaped exile on a barren planet and hijacked a starship to take his revenge on Admiral Kirk, while also scheming to turn an experimental planet-creating device into a doomsday weapon. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, Ricardo Montalban and Kirstie Alley.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: Admiral Kirk and his crew hijack the decommissioned Enterprise to recover the body of their fallen comrade Mr Spock from the planet Genesis. Kirk has learnt that Spock's spirit is still alive, and the Vulcan can be resurrected, but he must also battle a Klingon captain determined to control the planet's mysterious energy. Sci-fi sequel, directed by Leonard Nimoy, with William Shatner, DeForest Kelley and Christopher Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
programme.desc: The Enterprise crew travels back in time to prevent an alien probe destroying the Earth. The only thing that can avert the disaster is a humpback whale, a creature extinct in the 23rd century - but adjusting to life back in 1986 proves a distinct challenge. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring William Shatner, DeForest Kelley and Leonard Nimoy, who also directed.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.desc: The Starship Enterprise races to the rescue of intergalactic ambassadors held hostage on a distant planet. The crisis proves to be the handiwork of a renegade Vulcan mystic who kidnaps Captain Kirk and his crew, ordering them to fly to an unexplored world where he hopes to fulfil his insane ambition - to meet God. Sci-fi adventure, written, directed by and starring William Shatner, with Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley and David Warner.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
programme.desc: Captain Kirk is framed for the assassination of the Klingon head of state just as the Federation is about to make peace with their old enemies. As Kirk and Dr McCoy are banished to an icy prison planet, Spock tries to uncover the identity of the real killers. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley, Christopher Plummer, with appearances by Christian Slater and Michael Dorn from Star Trek: The Next Generation.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: Generations
programme.desc: USS Enterprise Captain Jean-Luc Picard must stop a deranged genius obsessed with gaining access to a mysterious energy source - regardless of the threat to entire civilisations that lie in his path. Help arrives from an unlikely quarter - his supposedly long dead predecessor Captain James T Kirk. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Patrick Stewart, William Shatner, Malcolm McDowell and Whoopi Goldberg.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact
programme.desc: Captain Jean-Luc Picard and the crew of the Enterprise face their deadliest enemies, the Borg, who travel back in time in an attempt to change Earth's history. The starship follows on a mission to foil their plan, but the vessel is taken over by members of the cyborg collective, leaving Picard consumed by a desire for revenge. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner, James Cromwell and Alice Krige.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.desc: Captain Picard and the Enterprise crew uncover a conspiracy by their own superiors and a sinister alien race to take over a peaceful world and exploit its power to prolong life. However, the crew is forced to defy Federation orders and turns renegade to protect the planet's inhabitants. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Patrick Stewart, F Murray Abraham, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner and Michael Dorn.(n)

programme.title: LEGO DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League - Cosmic Clash
programme.desc: The superhero team battles a super-intelligent robot villain plotting to take over the world. Before they can put a stop to his evil schemes, he transports the members of the league through time to different points in history. Only Batman and the Flash avoid this fate, and must find a way to bring their team-mates back to the present. Animated adventure, with the voices of Nolan North and Troy Baker.(n)

programme.title: Lego Batman: The Movie - DC Super Heroes Unite
programme.desc: When the Joker and Lex Luthor form an alliance, Batman must team up with the Justice League in order to stop them. Animated adventure, with the voices of Clancy Brown, Troy Baker and Christopher Corey Smith.(n)

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The masked crimefighter takes on the twin threats of disfigured maniac Two-Face and insane genius the Riddler, who are plotting to control the brains of the entire world. Meanwhile, an acrobat whose family has been murdered by Two-Face steps up to join Batman in his fight against evil. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Val Kilmer, Tommy Lee Jones, Nicole Kidman, Jim Carrey and Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: Batman has drifted into isolated retirement years after helping to rid Gotham of organised crime. He is lured into returning to duty by an encounter with an enigmatic thief, but his investigation leads to a far greater threat - the leader of a terrorist army planning to seize control of the city. Conclusion of Christopher Nolan's comic-book thriller trilogy, with Christian Bale, Anne Hathaway and Tom Hardy.(n)

programme.title: Batman: Gotham Knight
programme.desc: Premiere. Action-packed animated adventure pitting the avenger of Gotham City against dangerous villains Scarecrow, Killer Croc and Deadshot. Violent scenes/flashing images.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Lego Batman: The Movie - DC Super Heroes Unite
programme.desc: When the Joker and Lex Luthor form an alliance, Batman must team up with the Justice League in order to stop them. Animated adventure, with the voices of Clancy Brown, Troy Baker and Christopher Corey Smith.(n)

programme.title: Justice League: The Flashpoint Paradox
programme.desc: Premiere. Animated adventure featuring an alternate reality where Wonder Woman and Aquaman are at war, and there is no Superman. Can The Flash put things right?(n)

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The masked crimefighter takes on the twin threats of disfigured maniac Two-Face and insane genius the Riddler, who are plotting to control the brains of the entire world. Meanwhile, an acrobat whose family has been murdered by Two-Face steps up to join Batman in his fight against evil. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Val Kilmer, Tommy Lee Jones, Nicole Kidman, Jim Carrey and Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: Batman has drifted into isolated retirement years after helping to rid Gotham of organised crime. He is lured into returning to duty by an encounter with an enigmatic thief, but his investigation leads to a far greater threat - the leader of a terrorist army planning to seize control of the city. Conclusion of Christopher Nolan's comic-book thriller trilogy, with Christian Bale, Anne Hathaway and Tom Hardy.(n)

programme.title: The Spy Who Came in from the Cold
programme.desc: A burnt-out British spy is ordered to venture undercover in East Germany. He begins by faking his resignation and subsequent alcoholic depression to dupe the enemy into trusting him, but, as he becomes further embroiled in his mission, he comes to realise that he is merely a pawn. Espionage thriller, based on John Le Carre's novel, starring Richard Burton, Claire Bloom, Oskar Werner and Peter Van Eyck.(n)

programme.title: The Favourite Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Emma Stone, Olivia Colman and Rachel Weisz and director Yorgos Lanthimos talk about making the period comedy drama, set in the early 18th century in the court of Queen Anne.(n)

programme.title: A Night to Remember
programme.desc: Fact-based drama recreating the sinking of the Titanic, told from the point of view of the ship's second officer as he struggles to get as many passengers and crew off the vessel before it sinks. Meanwhile, the captain of a nearby vessel embarks on a doomed rescue mission. Starring Kenneth More, Honor Blackman, Ronald Allen, Tucker McGuire and David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: Fighting with My Family Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Stephen Merchant and stars Florence Pugh, Jack Lowden and Nick Frost talk about making the comedy drama based on a real family of wrestlers from Norwich.(n)

programme.title: Von Ryan's Express
programme.desc: A courageous American colonel with a never-say-die attitude is held in a PoW camp. He boldly sets out to lead a group of Allied prisoners in a daring mass escape bid by hijacking a freight train and fleeing through occupied Italy to Switzerland. Second World War action adventure, starring Frank Sinatra, Trevor Howard, Brad Dexter and James Brolin.(n)

programme.title: Us Interview Special
programme.desc: Filmmaker Jordan Peele and stars Lupita Nyong'o and Winston Duke talk about making the new horror-thriller US, the follow-up to the director's acclaimed first film, Get Out.(n)

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: A headstrong white-water rafting expert embarks on a holiday with her family, but their fun comes to an abrupt end when two killers show up. The fugitives' only escape route from the law is down a raging river, so they take the woman and her son hostage to act as guides. Meanwhile, her husband desperately tries to keep track from the riverbank, waiting for his opportunity to launch a rescue attempt. Action thriller, starring Meryl Streep, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn, Joseph Mazzello and John C Reilly.(n)

programme.title: Us Interview Special
programme.desc: Filmmaker Jordan Peele and stars Lupita Nyong'o and Winston Duke talk about making the new horror-thriller US, the follow-up to the director's acclaimed first film, Get Out.(n)

programme.title: Die Hard 4.0
programme.desc: Tough New York cop John McClane is sent to escort a computer hacker to Washington for questioning. During this routine operation he stumbles on a criminal mastermind's plan to launch a technological terrorist attack on the US, and is forced to enlist the hacker's aid in foiling the evil scheme. Action thriller sequel, with Bruce Willis, Timothy Olyphant, Justin Long and Maggie Q.(n)

programme.title: The Guest
programme.desc: A grieving couple are visited by a stranger, who claims to have been in the army with their dead son. They invite him to move in with them, and he proves a welcome addition to the household - but his arrival coincides with an outbreak of violent incidents that raise suspicions that he is not what he seems to be. Thriller, starring Dan Stevens and Maika Monroe.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A new arrival in town encourages the farmers to invest in a new form of corn. However, when he has an accident and does not come home, they think they have been cheated.(n)

programme.title: Have A Little Faith
programme.desc: Writer Mitch Alboms reluctantly agrees to pen the eulogy of his childhood rabbi. Biographical drama, starring Laurence Fishburne, Bradley Whitford and Anika Noni Rose.(n)

programme.title: Proof of Lies
programme.desc: A dedicated scientist carrying out research into the genetic cause of addictive behaviour seems on the verge of a ground-breaking discovery - until a break-in at her lab makes her suspect she has become caught up in a conspiracy motivated by greed. Thriller, starring Amanda Detmer, Jonathan Scarfe and Anthony Lemke.(n)

programme.title: The Bling Ring
programme.desc: Five teenagers united by an obsession with celebrity steal from the houses of the rich and famous stars they idolise, using the internet to follow their targets' movements. When the police finally catch up with them, the arrest brings a taste of the fame they have craved. Fact-based drama, starring Emma Watson and Israel Broussard.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura is attracted to a new boy in school, but Nellie is equally keen on him, and plans to ruin their romance.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary enters a state-wide maths competition, but Charles can't afford to pay the travel expenses necessary for her to compete. The entire town council foots the bill, taking great pride in her, but this causes Mary to worry she will let them down. American Western drama, starring Melissa Sue Anderson.(n)

programme.title: A Killer in the Family
programme.desc: A killer manages to con his three sons into helping him and his cellmate escape from prison - a move which lands them in the middle of a murder spree. Thriller based on a true story, starring Robert Mitchum, James Spader and Eric Stoltz.(n)

programme.title: Daddy's Girl
programme.desc: A landscape gardener finally finds new romance 10 years after his wife walked out - but as a result, his teenage daughter begins to suffer recurring nightmares about the night her mum disappeared. Turning to the police for help, she claims a murder has taken place, and a full investigation into the case begins - but suspicions remain that she is merely manipulating her dad. Drama, starring Martin Kemp.(n)

programme.title: Fatal Trust
programme.desc: A widow returns to the small town where she grew up to recover from her grief at the loss of her husband, and gets a job as a secretary to the local doctor. She becomes suspicious about the surprising number of patients who die after treatment, and becomes convinced the seemingly kind medic is poisoning them. Crime drama, starring Amy Jo Johnson and David Haydn-Jones.(n)

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.(n)

programme.title: Fatal Trust
programme.desc: A widow returns to the small town where she grew up to recover from her grief at the loss of her husband, and gets a job as a secretary to the local doctor. She becomes suspicious about the surprising number of patients who die after treatment, and becomes convinced the seemingly kind medic is poisoning them. Crime drama, starring Amy Jo Johnson and David Haydn-Jones.(n)

programme.title: Stand By Me
programme.desc: Four 12-year-old best friends embark on a life-changing adventure in the Oregon wilderness in search of a missing teenager's body, unaware of the trials and triumphs that await them. Rob Reiner's 1950s-set coming-of-age drama, based on a novella by Stephen King, starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Jerry O'Connell, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfuss.(n)

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.(n)

Rob Reiner's 1950s-set coming-of-age drama, based on a novella by Stephen King, starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Jerry O'Connell, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfuss.(n)

programme.title: Payback
programme.desc: A restaurateur reluctantly agrees to give evidence against corrupt police officers who savagely beat a witness, but they respond by framing her for murder. Thriller, starring Mary Tyler Moore, Edward Asner, Denis Arndt and Fredric Lane.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Walnut Grove community intervenes after a badly beaten boy is found unconscious on the floor of his cabin, the victim of his father's drunken rage.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A new arrival in town encourages the farmers to invest in a new form of corn. However, when he has an accident and does not come home, they think they have been cheated.(n)
